# The `StandardInstrumentations` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class provides an interface to register all the standard pass instrumentations and manages their state (if any). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::StandardInstrumentations</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class provides an interface to register all the standard pass instrumentations and manages their state (if any).
